<!-- begin post -->
<div class="container">
  <article class="post animate">

    <div class="post__content">
      <p>Sin tantum modo ad indicia veteris memoriae cognoscenda, curiosorum. Haec et tu ita posuisti, et verba vestra sunt. Idemne potest esse dies saepius, qui semel fuit? Ampulla enim sit necne sit, quis non iure optimo irrideatur, si laboret? Ego vero volo in virtute vim esse quam maximam; Serpere anguiculos, nare anaticulas, evolare merulas, cornibus uti videmus boves, nepas aculeis. Conferam tecum, quam cuique verso rem subicias. Si longus, levis ampulla enim sit necne vel omnia vel partes genere plurima et maxima.</p>

<blockquote>
  <p>The longer I live, the more I realize that I am never wrong about anything, and that all the pains I have so humbly taken to verify my notions have only wasted my time!</p>

  <p><cite>George Bernard Shaw</cite></p>
</blockquote>

<p>In qua quid est boni praeter summam voluptatem, et eam sempiternam? Cur post Tarentum ad Archytam? Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investigatio rerum occultissimarum. Negat enim tenuissimo victu, id est contemptissimis escis et potionibus, minorem voluptatem percipi quam rebus exquisitissimis ad epulandum. Non enim iam stirpis bonum quaeret, sed animalis. Qui autem esse poteris, nisi te amor ipse ceperit? Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur. Natura sic ab iis investigata est, ut nulla pars caelo, mari, terra, ut poëtice loquar, praetermissa sit; Eadem nunc mea adversum te oratio est. Mihi quidem Homerus huius modi quiddam vidisse videatur in iis, quae de Sirenum cantibus finxerit potionibus.</p>

<p><img src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/608.jpg" alt="Savanna" />
<em>Savanna / <a href="https://unsplash.com/">Unsplash</a></em></p>

<p>Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur. Natura sic ab iis investigata est, ut nulla pars caelo, mari, terra, ut poëtice loquar, praetermissa sit. Eadem nunc mea adversum te oratio est. Mihi quidem Homerus huius modi quiddam vidisse videatur in iis, quae de Sirenum cantibus finxerit. Neque enim disputari sine reprehensione nec cum iracundia aut pertinacia recte disputari potest. An, partus ancillae sitne in fructu habendus, disseretur inter principes civitatis. Put in geometria, prima si dederis, danda sunt omnia. Longum est enim ad omnia respondere.</p>

<p>&lt;iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/0Ph3m-EvUs0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen&gt;&lt;/iframe&gt;</p>

<p>Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investigatio rerum occultissimarum. Negat enim tenuissimo victu, id est contemptissimis escis et potionibus, minorem voluptatem percipi quam rebus exquisitissimis ad epulandum. Non enim iam stirpis bonum quaeret, sed animalis. Qui autem esse poteris, nisi te amor ipse ceperit? Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur disputari sine.</p>

<p>Sin tantum modo ad indicia veteris memoriae cognoscenda, curiosorum. Haec et tu ita posuisti, et verba vestra sunt. Idemne potest esse dies saepius, qui semel fuit? Ampulla enim sit necne sit, quis non iure optimo irrideatur, si laboret? Ego vero volo in virtute vim esse quam maximam; Serpere anguiculos, nare anaticulas, evolare merulas, cornibus uti videmus boves, nepas aculeis. Archytam? Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investiga.</p>

    </div>

        <div class="container__inner">
          <h3 class="related-title">You may also like</h3>
          <div class="row grid">

          
            
            

            

            
            
            
            

            

            
            
            
            

            

            
            
            
            

            

            
            
            
            

            

            
            
            
            

            

            
            
            
            

            

            
            
            
            

            

            

            <div class="article col col-4 col-d-6 col-t-12 grid__post">
              <div class="article__inner">

                
                <a class="article__image" href="/ai-and-science-podcast/2018/11/10/Remember-that-happiness-is-a-way-of-travel-not-a-destination/">
                  <img class="lazy" data-src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/01-1.jpg" alt="Remember that happiness is a way of travel, not a destination">
                </a>
                

                <div class="article__content">

                  <div class="article__meta">
                    <span class="article__minutes">
                      
                      
                        2 min read
                      
                      <time class="article__date"
                        datetime="2018-11-10T07:01:35-05:00">Nov 10, 2018</time>
                    </span>
                  </div>

                  <h2 class="article__title">Remember that happiness is a way of travel, not a destination</h2>

                  <p class="article__excerpt">Sin tantum modo ad indicia veteris memoriae cognoscenda, curiosorum. Haec et tu ita posuisti, et verba vestra sunt. Idemne potest esse dies...</p>

<script>
  function load_disqus() {
    var disqus_shortname = 'aousabdo-github-io',
      is_disqus_empty = document.getElementById('disqus_empty'),
      disqus_target = document.getElementById('disqus_thread'),
      disqus_embed = document.createElement('script'),
      disqus_hook = (document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]);

    if (disqus_target && is_disqus_empty) {
      disqus_embed.type = 'text/javascript';
      disqus_embed.async = true;
      disqus_embed.src = '//' + disqus_shortname + '.disqus.com/embed.js';
      disqus_hook.appendChild(disqus_embed);
      is_disqus_empty.remove();
    }
  }

  window.addEventListener('scroll', function (e) {
    var currentScroll = document.scrollingElement.scrollTop;
    var disqus_target = document.getElementById('disqus_thread');

    if (disqus_target && (currentScroll > disqus_target.getBoundingClientRect().top - 150)) {
      load_disqus('disqus_shortname');
    }
  }, false);

</script>

      <div class="col col-6 col-t-12">
        <div class="post-head__box">
        
          <div class="post__meta">
            <span class="post__minutes">
              
              
                2 min read
              
              <time class="post__date"
                datetime="2018-11-09T07:01:35-05:00">Nov 9, 2018</time>
            </span>
          </div>
        
          <h2 class="post__title">A journey of a thousand leagues begins beneath one’s feet</h2>
        
          <div class="post__bottom">
        
            <div class="post__author">
              <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" aria-label="Dr. Aous A. Abdo"><img class="post__author-image"
                  src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/author-profile-square.png" alt="Dr. Aous A. Abdo's Picture"></a>
            </div>
        
            <div class="post__bottom-meta">
              <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" class="post__author-link">Dr. Aous A. Abdo</a>
              
              <span>in</span>
              <span class="post-tags">
                
                <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/Lifestyle" class="post__tag">Lifestyle</a>
                
                <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/Rest" class="post__tag">Rest</a>
                
              </span>
              
            </div>
          </div>
        
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<!-- begin post -->
<div class="container">
  <article class="post animate">

    <div class="post__content">
      <p>Sin tantum modo ad indicia veteris memoriae cognoscenda, curiosorum. Haec et tu ita posuisti, et verba vestra sunt. Idemne potest esse dies saepius, qui semel fuit? Ampulla enim sit necne sit, quis non iure optimo irrideatur, si laboret? Ego vero volo in virtute vim esse quam maximam; Serpere anguiculos, nare anaticulas, evolare merulas, cornibus uti videmus boves, nepas aculeis. Conferam tecum, quam cuique verso rem subicias. Si longus, levis ampulla enim sit necne vel omnia vel partes genere plurima et maxima.</p>

<blockquote>
  <p>The longer I live, the more I realize that I am never wrong about anything, and that all the pains I have so humbly taken to verify my notions have only wasted my time!</p>

  <p><cite>George Bernard Shaw</cite></p>
</blockquote>

<p>In qua quid est boni praeter summam voluptatem, et eam sempiternam? Cur post Tarentum ad Archytam? Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investigatio rerum occultissimarum. Negat enim tenuissimo victu, id est contemptissimis escis et potionibus, minorem voluptatem percipi quam rebus exquisitissimis ad epulandum. Non enim iam stirpis bonum quaeret, sed animalis. Qui autem esse poteris, nisi te amor ipse ceperit? Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur. Natura sic ab iis investigata est, ut nulla pars caelo, mari, terra, ut poëtice loquar, praetermissa sit; Eadem nunc mea adversum te oratio est. Mihi quidem Homerus huius modi quiddam vidisse videatur in iis, quae de Sirenum cantibus finxerit potionibus.</p>

<p><img src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/605.jpg" alt="The mountains" />
<em>The mountains / <a href="https://unsplash.com/">Unsplash</a></em></p>

<p>Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur. Natura sic ab iis investigata est, ut nulla pars caelo, mari, terra, ut poëtice loquar, praetermissa sit. Eadem nunc mea adversum te oratio est. Mihi quidem Homerus huius modi quiddam vidisse videatur in iis, quae de Sirenum cantibus finxerit. Neque enim disputari sine reprehensione nec cum iracundia aut pertinacia recte disputari potest. An, partus ancillae sitne in fructu habendus, disseretur inter principes civitatis. Put in geometria, prima si dederis, danda sunt omnia. Longum est enim ad omnia respondere.</p>

<p>&lt;iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/aDoanNM7O_s" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen&gt;&lt;/iframe&gt;</p>

<p>Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investigatio rerum occultissimarum. Negat enim tenuissimo victu, id est contemptissimis escis et potionibus, minorem voluptatem percipi quam rebus exquisitissimis ad epulandum. Non enim iam stirpis bonum quaeret, sed animalis. Qui autem esse poteris, nisi te amor ipse ceperit? Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur disputari sine.</p>

<p>Sin tantum modo ad indicia veteris memoriae cognoscenda, curiosorum. Haec et tu ita posuisti, et verba vestra sunt. Idemne potest esse dies saepius, qui semel fuit? Ampulla enim sit necne sit, quis non iure optimo irrideatur, si laboret? Ego vero volo in virtute vim esse quam maximam; Serpere anguiculos, nare anaticulas, evolare merulas, cornibus uti videmus boves, nepas aculeis. Archytam? Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investiga.</p>

    </div>

                </a>
                

                <div class="article__content">

                  <div class="article__meta">
                    <span class="article__minutes">
                      
                      
                        2 min read
                      
                      <time class="article__date"
                        datetime="2018-10-31T08:01:35-04:00">Oct 31, 2018</time>
                    </span>
                  </div>

                  <h2 class="article__title">The way I see it, every life is a pile of good things</h2>

                  <p class="article__excerpt">Sin tantum modo ad indicia veteris memoriae cognoscenda, curiosorum. Haec et tu ita posuisti, et verba vestra sunt. Idemne potest esse dies...</p>

                  <div class="article__bottom">

                    
                    <div class="article__author">

<script>
  function load_disqus() {
    var disqus_shortname = 'aousabdo-github-io',
      is_disqus_empty = document.getElementById('disqus_empty'),
      disqus_target = document.getElementById('disqus_thread'),
      disqus_embed = document.createElement('script'),
      disqus_hook = (document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]);

    if (disqus_target && is_disqus_empty) {
      disqus_embed.type = 'text/javascript';
      disqus_embed.async = true;
      disqus_embed.src = '//' + disqus_shortname + '.disqus.com/embed.js';
      disqus_hook.appendChild(disqus_embed);
      is_disqus_empty.remove();
    }
  }

  window.addEventListener('scroll', function (e) {
    var currentScroll = document.scrollingElement.scrollTop;
    var disqus_target = document.getElementById('disqus_thread');

    if (disqus_target && (currentScroll > disqus_target.getBoundingClientRect().top - 150)) {
      load_disqus('disqus_shortname');
    }
  }, false);

</script>
<noscript>Please enable JavaScript to view the
  <a href="https://disqus.com/?ref_noscript">comments powered by Disqus.</a>
</noscript>

.related-title::after{content:"";position:absolute;left:0;top:50%;z-index:-1;transform:translateY(-50%);display:block;width:106px;height:38px;border-radius:4px 0px 0px 576px){.post-comments{padding:48px 32px}}.full-episode-link{display:inline-block;margin-top:20px;margin-bottom:20px;padding:15px ease}.full-episode-link:hover{background-color:#08c}.cta-section{background-color:#f0f0f0;padding:20px;border-radius:8px;text-align:center;margin:20px 0}.cta-section         </div>

      <div class="col col-6 col-t-12">
        <div class="post-head__box">
        
          <div class="post__meta">
            <span class="post__minutes">
              
              
                2 min read
              
              <time class="post__date"
                datetime="2018-11-08T07:01:35-05:00">Nov 8, 2018</time>
            </span>
          </div>
        
          <h2 class="post__title">Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one’s courage</h2>
        
          <div class="post__bottom">
        
            <div class="post__author">
              <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" aria-label="Dr. Aous A. Abdo"><img class="post__author-image"
                  src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/author-profile-square.png" alt="Dr. Aous A. Abdo's Picture"></a>
            </div>
        
            <div class="post__bottom-meta">
              <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" class="post__author-link">Dr. Aous A. Abdo</a>
              
              <span>in</span>
              <span class="post-tags">
                
                <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/Work" class="post__tag">Work</a>
                
                <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/Fashion" class="post__tag">Fashion</a>
                
              </span>
              
            </div>
          </div>
        
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<!-- begin post -->
<div class="container">
  <article class="post animate">

    <div class="post__content">
      <p>Sin tantum modo ad indicia veteris memoriae cognoscenda, curiosorum. Haec et tu ita posuisti, et verba vestra sunt. Idemne potest esse dies saepius, qui semel fuit? Ampulla enim sit necne sit, quis non iure optimo irrideatur, si laboret? Ego vero volo in virtute vim esse quam maximam; Serpere anguiculos, nare anaticulas, evolare merulas, cornibus uti videmus boves, nepas aculeis. Conferam tecum, quam cuique verso rem subicias. Si longus, levis ampulla enim sit necne vel omnia vel partes genere plurima et maxima.</p>

<blockquote>
  <p>The longer I live, the more I realize that I am never wrong about anything, and that all the pains I have so humbly taken to verify my notions have only wasted my time!</p>

  <p><cite>George Bernard Shaw</cite></p>
</blockquote>

<p>In qua quid est boni praeter summam voluptatem, et eam sempiternam? Cur post Tarentum ad Archytam? Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investigatio rerum occultissimarum. Negat enim tenuissimo victu, id est contemptissimis escis et potionibus, minorem voluptatem percipi quam rebus exquisitissimis ad epulandum. Non enim iam stirpis bonum quaeret, sed animalis. Qui autem esse poteris, nisi te amor ipse ceperit? Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur. Natura sic ab iis investigata est, ut nulla pars caelo, mari, terra, ut poëtice loquar, praetermissa sit; Eadem nunc mea adversum te oratio est. Mihi quidem Homerus huius modi quiddam vidisse videatur in iis, quae de Sirenum cantibus finxerit potionibus.</p>

<p><img src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/607.jpg" alt="The clouds" />
<em>The clouds / <a href="https://unsplash.com/">Unsplash</a></em></p>

<p>Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur. Natura sic ab iis investigata est, ut nulla pars caelo, mari, terra, ut poëtice loquar, praetermissa sit. Eadem nunc mea adversum te oratio est. Mihi quidem Homerus huius modi quiddam vidisse videatur in iis, quae de Sirenum cantibus finxerit. Neque enim disputari sine reprehensione nec cum iracundia aut pertinacia recte disputari potest. An, partus ancillae sitne in fructu habendus, disseretur inter principes civitatis. Put in geometria, prima si dederis, danda sunt omnia. Longum est enim ad omnia respondere.</p>

<p>&lt;iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/VNGUdObDoLk" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen&gt;&lt;/iframe&gt;</p>

<p>Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investigatio rerum occultissimarum. Negat enim tenuissimo victu, id est contemptissimis escis et potionibus, minorem voluptatem percipi quam rebus exquisitissimis ad epulandum. Non enim iam stirpis bonum quaeret, sed animalis. Qui autem esse poteris, nisi te amor ipse ceperit? Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur disputari sine.</p>

<p>Sin tantum modo ad indicia veteris memoriae cognoscenda, curiosorum. Haec et tu ita posuisti, et verba vestra sunt. Idemne potest esse dies saepius, qui semel fuit? Ampulla enim sit necne sit, quis non iure optimo irrideatur, si laboret? Ego vero volo in virtute vim esse quam maximam; Serpere anguiculos, nare anaticulas, evolare merulas, cornibus uti videmus boves, nepas aculeis. Archytam? Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investiga.</p>

    </div>

<div class="container">
  <div class="row">
    <div class="col col-12">
      <div class="disqus-inner">
        <div id="disqus_thread" class="post-comments">
          <div id="disqus_empty"></div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<script>
  function load_disqus() {
    var disqus_shortname = 'aousabdo-github-io',
      is_disqus_empty = document.getElementById('disqus_empty'),
      disqus_target = document.getElementById('disqus_thread'),
      disqus_embed = document.createElement('script'),
      disqus_hook = (document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]);

    if (disqus_target && is_disqus_empty) {
      disqus_embed.type = 'text/javascript';
      disqus_embed.async = true;
      disqus_embed.src = '//' + disqus_shortname + '.disqus.com/embed.js';
      disqus_hook.appendChild(disqus_embed);
      is_disqus_empty.remove();
    }
  }

  window.addEventListener('scroll', function (e) {
    var currentScroll = document.scrollingElement.scrollTop;
    var disqus_target = document.getElementById('disqus_thread');

    if (disqus_target && (currentScroll > disqus_target.getBoundingClientRect().top - 150)) {
      load_disqus('disqus_shortname');
    }
  }, false);

</script>
<noscript>Please enable JavaScript to view the
  <a href="https://disqus.com/?ref_noscript">comments powered by Disqus.</a>
</noscript>

        <h4 class="recent-posts__title"><a href="/2024/07/18/Episode-4-AI-and-the-Search-for-Extraterrestrial-Life/">Episode 4: AI and the Search for Extraterrestrial Life</a></h4>

            <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" aria-label="Dr. Aous A. Abdo"><img class="article__author-image lazy" data-src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/author-profile-square.png" alt="Dr. Aous A. Abdo's Picture"></a>

  <!-- begin content -->
  <main class="content" aria-label="Content">
    <div class="post-head">
  <div class="container">
    <div class="row">
      
      <div class="col col-6 col-t-12">
        <div class="image-box">
          <img class="post-image lazy" data-src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/16.jpg" alt="You must be the change you wish to see in the world">
        </div>
      </div>
      
  
      <div class="col col-6 col-t-12">
        <div class="post-head__box">
        
          <div class="post__meta">
            <span class="post__minutes">
              
              
                2 min read
              
              <time class="post__date"
                datetime="2018-11-06T07:01:35-05:00">Nov 6, 2018</time>
            </span>
          </div>
        
          <h2 class="post__title">You must be the change you wish to see in the world</h2>
        
          <div class="post__bottom">
        
            <div class="post__author">
              <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" aria-label="Dr. Aous A. Abdo"><img class="post__author-image"
                  src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/author-profile-square.png" alt="Dr. Aous A. Abdo's Picture"></a>
            </div>
        
            <div class="post__bottom-meta">
              <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" class="post__author-link">Dr. Aous A. Abdo</a>
              
              <span>in</span>
              <span class="post-tags">
                
                <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/Travels" class="post__tag">Travels</a>
                
                <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/Story" class="post__tag">Story</a>
                
              </span>
              
            </div>
          </div>
        
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<!-- begin post -->
<div class="container">
  <article class="post animate">

    <div class="post__content">
      <p>Sin tantum modo ad indicia veteris memoriae cognoscenda, curiosorum. Haec et tu ita posuisti, et verba vestra sunt. Idemne potest esse dies saepius, qui semel fuit? Ampulla enim sit necne sit, quis non iure optimo irrideatur, si laboret? Ego vero volo in virtute vim esse quam maximam; Serpere anguiculos, nare anaticulas, evolare merulas, cornibus uti videmus boves, nepas aculeis. Conferam tecum, quam cuique verso rem subicias. Si longus, levis ampulla enim sit necne vel omnia vel partes genere plurima et maxima.</p>

<blockquote>
  <p>The longer I live, the more I realize that I am never wrong about anything, and that all the pains I have so humbly taken to verify my notions have only wasted my time!</p>

  <p><cite>George Bernard Shaw</cite></p>
</blockquote>

<p>In qua quid est boni praeter summam voluptatem, et eam sempiternam? Cur post Tarentum ad Archytam? Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investigatio rerum occultissimarum. Negat enim tenuissimo victu, id est contemptissimis escis et potionibus, minorem voluptatem percipi quam rebus exquisitissimis ad epulandum. Non enim iam stirpis bonum quaeret, sed animalis. Qui autem esse poteris, nisi te amor ipse ceperit? Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur. Natura sic ab iis investigata est, ut nulla pars caelo, mari, terra, ut poëtice loquar, praetermissa sit; Eadem nunc mea adversum te oratio est. Mihi quidem Homerus huius modi quiddam vidisse videatur in iis, quae de Sirenum cantibus finxerit potionibus.</p>

<p><img src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/609.jpg" alt="Minimalism" />
<em>Minimalism / <a href="https://unsplash.com/">Unsplash</a></em></p>

<p>Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur. Natura sic ab iis investigata est, ut nulla pars caelo, mari, terra, ut poëtice loquar, praetermissa sit. Eadem nunc mea adversum te oratio est. Mihi quidem Homerus huius modi quiddam vidisse videatur in iis, quae de Sirenum cantibus finxerit. Neque enim disputari sine reprehensione nec cum iracundia aut pertinacia recte disputari potest. An, partus ancillae sitne in fructu habendus, disseretur inter principes civitatis. Put in geometria, prima si dederis, danda sunt omnia. Longum est enim ad omnia respondere.</p>

<p>&lt;iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/IHt71N47cc0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen&gt;&lt;/iframe&gt;</p>

<p>Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investigatio rerum occultissimarum. Negat enim tenuissimo victu, id est contemptissimis escis et potionibus, minorem voluptatem percipi quam rebus exquisitissimis ad epulandum. Non enim iam stirpis bonum quaeret, sed animalis. Qui autem esse poteris, nisi te amor ipse ceperit? Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur disputari sine.</p>

<p>Sin tantum modo ad indicia veteris memoriae cognoscenda, curiosorum. Haec et tu ita posuisti, et verba vestra sunt. Idemne potest esse dies saepius, qui semel fuit? Ampulla enim sit necne sit, quis non iure optimo irrideatur, si laboret? Ego vero volo in virtute vim esse quam maximam; Serpere anguiculos, nare anaticulas, evolare merulas, cornibus uti videmus boves, nepas aculeis. Archytam? Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investiga.</p>

    </div>

        <a class="share__link share__pinterest" href="http://pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=http://localhost:4000/2018/11/06/You-must-be-the-change-you-wish-to-see-in-the-world/&amp;media=http://localhost:4000/ai-and-science-podcast/images/16.jpg&amp;description=You%20must%20be%20the%20change%20you%20wish%20to%20see%20in%20the%20world" onclick="window.open(this.href, 'pop-up', 'left=20,top=20,width=900,height=500,toolbar=1,resizable=0'); return false;" title="Share on Pinterest" rel="nofollow"><i class="ion ion-logo-pinterest"></i></a>

      <div class="disqus-inner">

<script>
  function load_disqus() {
    var disqus_shortname = 'aousabdo-github-io',
      is_disqus_empty = document.getElementById('disqus_empty'),
      disqus_target = document.getElementById('disqus_thread'),
      disqus_embed = document.createElement('script'),
      disqus_hook = (document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]);

    if (disqus_target && is_disqus_empty) {
      disqus_embed.type = 'text/javascript';
      disqus_embed.async = true;
      disqus_embed.src = '//' + disqus_shortname + '.disqus.com/embed.js';
      disqus_hook.appendChild(disqus_embed);
      is_disqus_empty.remove();
    }
  }

  window.addEventListener('scroll', function (e) {
    var currentScroll = document.scrollingElement.scrollTop;
    var disqus_target = document.getElementById('disqus_thread');

    if (disqus_target && (currentScroll > disqus_target.getBoundingClientRect().top - 150)) {
      load_disqus('disqus_shortname');
    }
  }, false);

</script>
<noscript>Please enable JavaScript to view the
  <a href="https://disqus.com/?ref_noscript">comments powered by Disqus.</a>
</noscript>

  var base_url = "",
    pagination_next_url = base_url + '/page2',
    pagination_next_page_number = '',
    pagination_available_pages_number = '';
</script>
</body>

</html>
```````

          <h2 class="post__title">Do what you can, with what you have, where you are</h2>
        
          <div class="post__bottom">
        
            <div class="post__author">
              <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" aria-label="Dr. Aous A. Abdo"><img class="post__author-image"

<!-- begin post -->
<div class="container">
  <article class="post animate">

    <div class="post__content">
      <p>Sin tantum modo ad indicia veteris memoriae cognoscenda, curiosorum. Haec et tu ita posuisti, et verba vestra sunt. Idemne potest esse dies saepius, qui semel fuit? Ampulla enim sit necne sit, quis non iure optimo irrideatur, si laboret? Ego vero volo in virtute vim esse quam maximam; Serpere anguiculos, nare anaticulas, evolare merulas, cornibus uti videmus boves, nepas aculeis. Conferam tecum, quam cuique verso rem subicias. Si longus, levis ampulla enim sit necne vel omnia vel partes genere plurima et maxima.</p>

<blockquote>
  <p>The longer I live, the more I realize that I am never wrong about anything, and that all the pains I have so humbly taken to verify my notions have only wasted my time!</p>

  <p><cite>George Bernard Shaw</cite></p>
</blockquote>

<p>In qua quid est boni praeter summam voluptatem, et eam sempiternam? Cur post Tarentum ad Archytam? Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investigatio rerum occultissimarum. Negat enim tenuissimo victu, id est contemptissimis escis et potionibus, minorem voluptatem percipi quam rebus exquisitissimis ad epulandum. Non enim iam stirpis bonum quaeret, sed animalis. Qui autem esse poteris, nisi te amor ipse ceperit? Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur. Natura sic ab iis investigata est, ut nulla pars caelo, mari, terra, ut poëtice loquar, praetermissa sit; Eadem nunc mea adversum te oratio est. Mihi quidem Homerus huius modi quiddam vidisse videatur in iis, quae de Sirenum cantibus finxerit potionibus.</p>

<p><img src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/602.jpg" alt="Lonely house" />
<em>Lonely house / <a href="https://unsplash.com/">Unsplash</a></em></p>

<p>Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur. Natura sic ab iis investigata est, ut nulla pars caelo, mari, terra, ut poëtice loquar, praetermissa sit. Eadem nunc mea adversum te oratio est. Mihi quidem Homerus huius modi quiddam vidisse videatur in iis, quae de Sirenum cantibus finxerit. Neque enim disputari sine reprehensione nec cum iracundia aut pertinacia recte disputari potest. An, partus ancillae sitne in fructu habendus, disseretur inter principes civitatis. Put in geometria, prima si dederis, danda sunt omnia. Longum est enim ad omnia respondere.</p>

<p>&lt;iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/JphHw6iU4m8" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen&gt;&lt;/iframe&gt;</p>

<p>Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investigatio rerum occultissimarum. Negat enim tenuissimo victu, id est contemptissimis escis et potionibus, minorem voluptatem percipi quam rebus exquisitissimis ad epulandum. Non enim iam stirpis bonum quaeret, sed animalis. Qui autem esse poteris, nisi te amor ipse ceperit? Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur disputari sine.</p>

<p>Sin tantum modo ad indicia veteris memoriae cognoscenda, curiosorum. Haec et tu ita posuisti, et verba vestra sunt. Idemne potest esse dies saepius, qui semel fuit? Ampulla enim sit necne sit, quis non iure optimo irrideatur, si laboret? Ego vero volo in virtute vim esse quam maximam; Serpere anguiculos, nare anaticulas, evolare merulas, cornibus uti videmus boves, nepas aculeis. Archytam? Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investiga.</p>

    </div>

<script>
  function load_disqus() {
    var disqus_shortname = 'aousabdo-github-io',
      is_disqus_empty = document.getElementById('disqus_empty'),
      disqus_target = document.getElementById('disqus_thread'),
      disqus_embed = document.createElement('script'),
      disqus_hook = (document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]);

    if (disqus_target && is_disqus_empty) {
      disqus_embed.type = 'text/javascript';
      disqus_embed.async = true;
      disqus_embed.src = '//' + disqus_shortname + '.disqus.com/embed.js';
      disqus_hook.appendChild(disqus_embed);
      is_disqus_empty.remove();
    }
  }

  window.addEventListener('scroll', function (e) {
    var currentScroll = document.scrollingElement.scrollTop;
    var disqus_target = document.getElementById('disqus_thread');

    if (disqus_target && (currentScroll > disqus_target.getBoundingClientRect().top - 150)) {
      load_disqus('disqus_shortname');
    }
  }, false);

</script>

          <div class="post__meta">
            <span class="post__minutes">
              
              
                2 min read
              
              <time class="post__date"
                datetime="2018-11-13T07:01:35-05:00">Nov 13, 2018</time>
            </span>
          </div>
        
          <h2 class="post__title">That which does not kill us makes us stronger</h2>
        
          <div class="post__bottom">
        
            <div class="post__author">
              <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" aria-label="Dr. Aous A. Abdo"><img class="post__author-image"
                  src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/author-profile-square.png" alt="Dr. Aous A. Abdo's Picture"></a>
            </div>
        
            <div class="post__bottom-meta">
              <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" class="post__author-link">Dr. Aous A. Abdo</a>
              
              <span>in</span>
              <span class="post-tags">
                
                <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/Business" class="post__tag">Business</a>
                
                <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/Work" class="post__tag">Work</a>
                
              </span>
              
            </div>
          </div>
        
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<!-- begin post -->
<div class="container">
  <article class="post animate">

    <div class="post__content">
      <p>Sin tantum modo ad indicia veteris memoriae cognoscenda, curiosorum. Haec et tu ita posuisti, et verba vestra sunt. Idemne potest esse dies saepius, qui semel fuit? Ampulla enim sit necne sit, quis non iure optimo irrideatur, si laboret? Ego vero volo in virtute vim esse quam maximam; Serpere anguiculos, nare anaticulas, evolare merulas, cornibus uti videmus boves, nepas aculeis. Conferam tecum, quam cuique verso rem subicias. Si longus, levis ampulla enim sit necne vel omnia vel partes genere plurima et maxima.</p>

<blockquote>
  <p>The longer I live, the more I realize that I am never wrong about anything, and that all the pains I have so humbly taken to verify my notions have only wasted my time!</p>

  <p><cite>George Bernard Shaw</cite></p>
</blockquote>

<p>In qua quid est boni praeter summam voluptatem, et eam sempiternam? Cur post Tarentum ad Archytam? Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investigatio rerum occultissimarum. Negat enim tenuissimo victu, id est contemptissimis escis et potionibus, minorem voluptatem percipi quam rebus exquisitissimis ad epulandum. Non enim iam stirpis bonum quaeret, sed animalis. Qui autem esse poteris, nisi te amor ipse ceperit? Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur. Natura sic ab iis investigata est, ut nulla pars caelo, mari, terra, ut poëtice loquar, praetermissa sit; Eadem nunc mea adversum te oratio est. Mihi quidem Homerus huius modi quiddam vidisse videatur in iis, quae de Sirenum cantibus finxerit potionibus.</p>

<p><img src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/600.jpg" alt="Start of the day" />
<em>Start of the day / <a href="https://unsplash.com/">Unsplash</a></em></p>

<p>Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur. Natura sic ab iis investigata est, ut nulla pars caelo, mari, terra, ut poëtice loquar, praetermissa sit. Eadem nunc mea adversum te oratio est. Mihi quidem Homerus huius modi quiddam vidisse videatur in iis, quae de Sirenum cantibus finxerit. Neque enim disputari sine reprehensione nec cum iracundia aut pertinacia recte disputari potest. An, partus ancillae sitne in fructu habendus, disseretur inter principes civitatis. Put in geometria, prima si dederis, danda sunt omnia. Longum est enim ad omnia respondere.</p>

<p>&lt;iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/WO25XI8tfgI" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen&gt;&lt;/iframe&gt;</p>

<p>Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investigatio rerum occultissimarum. Negat enim tenuissimo victu, id est contemptissimis escis et potionibus, minorem voluptatem percipi quam rebus exquisitissimis ad epulandum. Non enim iam stirpis bonum quaeret, sed animalis. Qui autem esse poteris, nisi te amor ipse ceperit? Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur disputari sine.</p>

<p>Sin tantum modo ad indicia veteris memoriae cognoscenda, curiosorum. Haec et tu ita posuisti, et verba vestra sunt. Idemne potest esse dies saepius, qui semel fuit? Ampulla enim sit necne sit, quis non iure optimo irrideatur, si laboret? Ego vero volo in virtute vim esse quam maximam; Serpere anguiculos, nare anaticulas, evolare merulas, cornibus uti videmus boves, nepas aculeis. Archytam? Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investiga.</p>

    </div>

                </a>
                

                <div class="article__content">

                  <div class="article__meta">
                    <span class="article__minutes">
                      
                      
                        2 min read

                    </span>
                  </div>

                  <h2 class="article__title">Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value</h2>

                  <p class="article__excerpt">Sin tantum modo ad indicia veteris memoriae cognoscenda, curiosorum. Haec et tu ita posuisti, et verba vestra sunt. Idemne potest esse dies...</p>

                  <div class="article__bottom">

                    
                    <div class="article__author">
                      <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" aria-label="Dr. Aous A. Abdo"><img class="article__author-image lazy" data-src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/author-profile-square.png" alt="Dr. Aous A. Abdo's Picture"></a>
                    </div>
                    

                    <div class="article__bottom-meta">
                      
                        <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" class="article__author-link">Dr. Aous A. Abdo</a>
                      
                      
                      <span>in</span>
                      <span class="article-tags">
                        
                          <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/Work" class="article__tag">Work</a>
                        
                          <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/Technology" class="article__tag">Technology</a>
                        
                      </span>
                      
                    </div>
                  </div>

                </div>

              </div>
            </div>

            
                
                  
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<script>
  function load_disqus() {
    var disqus_shortname = 'aousabdo-github-io',
      is_disqus_empty = document.getElementById('disqus_empty'),
      disqus_target = document.getElementById('disqus_thread'),
      disqus_embed = document.createElement('script'),
      disqus_hook = (document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]);

    if (disqus_target && is_disqus_empty) {
      disqus_embed.type = 'text/javascript';
      disqus_embed.async = true;
      disqus_embed.src = '//' + disqus_shortname + '.disqus.com/embed.js';
      disqus_hook.appendChild(disqus_embed);
      is_disqus_empty.remove();
    }
  }

  window.addEventListener('scroll', function (e) {
    var currentScroll = document.scrollingElement.scrollTop;
    var disqus_target = document.getElementById('disqus_thread');

    if (disqus_target && (currentScroll > disqus_target.getBoundingClientRect().top - 150)) {
      load_disqus('disqus_shortname');
    }
  }, false);

</script>

  <!-- begin content -->
  <main class="content" aria-label="Content">

  <div class="container">
    <div class="row">
      
      <div class="col col-6 col-t-12">
        <div class="image-box">
          <img class="post-image lazy" data-src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/11.jpg" alt="The way I see it, every life is a pile of good things">
        </div>
      </div>
      
  
      <div class="col col-6 col-t-12">
        <div class="post-head__box">
        
          <div class="post__meta">
            <span class="post__minutes">
              
              
                2 min read
              
              <time class="post__date"
                datetime="2018-10-31T08:01:35-04:00">Oct 31, 2018</time>
            </span>
          </div>
        
          <h2 class="post__title">The way I see it, every life is a pile of good things</h2>
        
          <div class="post__bottom">
        
            <div class="post__author">
              <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" aria-label="Dr. Aous A. Abdo"><img class="post__author-image"
                  src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/author-profile-square.png" alt="Dr. Aous A. Abdo's Picture"></a>
            </div>
        
            <div class="post__bottom-meta">
              <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" class="post__author-link">Dr. Aous A. Abdo</a>
              
              <span>in</span>
              <span class="post-tags">
                
                <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/Life" class="post__tag">Life</a>
                
                <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/Rest" class="post__tag">Rest</a>
                
              </span>
              
            </div>
          </div>
        
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<!-- begin post -->
<div class="container">
  <article class="post animate">

    <div class="post__content">
      <p>Sin tantum modo ad indicia veteris memoriae cognoscenda, curiosorum. Haec et tu ita posuisti, et verba vestra sunt. Idemne potest esse dies saepius, qui semel fuit? Ampulla enim sit necne sit, quis non iure optimo irrideatur, si laboret? Ego vero volo in virtute vim esse quam maximam; Serpere anguiculos, nare anaticulas, evolare merulas, cornibus uti videmus boves, nepas aculeis. Conferam tecum, quam cuique verso rem subicias. Si longus, levis ampulla enim sit necne vel omnia vel partes genere plurima et maxima.</p>

<blockquote>
  <p>The longer I live, the more I realize that I am never wrong about anything, and that all the pains I have so humbly taken to verify my notions have only wasted my time!</p>

  <p><cite>George Bernard Shaw</cite></p>
</blockquote>

<p>In qua quid est boni praeter summam voluptatem, et eam sempiternam? Cur post Tarentum ad Archytam? Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investigatio rerum occultissimarum. Negat enim tenuissimo victu, id est contemptissimis escis et potionibus, minorem voluptatem percipi quam rebus exquisitissimis ad epulandum. Non enim iam stirpis bonum quaeret, sed animalis. Qui autem esse poteris, nisi te amor ipse ceperit? Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur. Natura sic ab iis investigata est, ut nulla pars caelo, mari, terra, ut poëtice loquar, praetermissa sit; Eadem nunc mea adversum te oratio est. Mihi quidem Homerus huius modi quiddam vidisse videatur in iis, quae de Sirenum cantibus finxerit potionibus.</p>

<p><img src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/612.jpg" alt="Alone with myself" />
<em>Alone with myself / <a href="https://unsplash.com/">Unsplash</a></em></p>

<p>Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur. Natura sic ab iis investigata est, ut nulla pars caelo, mari, terra, ut poëtice loquar, praetermissa sit. Eadem nunc mea adversum te oratio est. Mihi quidem Homerus huius modi quiddam vidisse videatur in iis, quae de Sirenum cantibus finxerit. Neque enim disputari sine reprehensione nec cum iracundia aut pertinacia recte disputari potest. An, partus ancillae sitne in fructu habendus, disseretur inter principes civitatis. Put in geometria, prima si dederis, danda sunt omnia. Longum est enim ad omnia respondere.</p>

<p>&lt;iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Z9CsuNMdvLg" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen&gt;&lt;/iframe&gt;</p>

<p>Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investigatio rerum occultissimarum. Negat enim tenuissimo victu, id est contemptissimis escis et potionibus, minorem voluptatem percipi quam rebus exquisitissimis ad epulandum. Non enim iam stirpis bonum quaeret, sed animalis. Qui autem esse poteris, nisi te amor ipse ceperit? Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur disputari sine.</p>

<p>Sin tantum modo ad indicia veteris memoriae cognoscenda, curiosorum. Haec et tu ita posuisti, et verba vestra sunt. Idemne potest esse dies saepius, qui semel fuit? Ampulla enim sit necne sit, quis non iure optimo irrideatur, si laboret? Ego vero volo in virtute vim esse quam maximam; Serpere anguiculos, nare anaticulas, evolare merulas, cornibus uti videmus boves, nepas aculeis. Archytam? Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investiga.</p>

    </div>

<div class="container">
  <div class="row">
    <div class="col col-12">
      <div class="disqus-inner">
        <div id="disqus_thread" class="post-comments">
          <div id="disqus_empty"></div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<script>
  function load_disqus() {
    var disqus_shortname = 'aousabdo-github-io',
      is_disqus_empty = document.getElementById('disqus_empty'),
      disqus_target = document.getElementById('disqus_thread'),
      disqus_embed = document.createElement('script'),
      disqus_hook = (document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]);

    if (disqus_target && is_disqus_empty) {
      disqus_embed.type = 'text/javascript';
      disqus_embed.async = true;
      disqus_embed.src = '//' + disqus_shortname + '.disqus.com/embed.js';
      disqus_hook.appendChild(disqus_embed);
      is_disqus_empty.remove();
    }
  }

  window.addEventListener('scroll', function (e) {
    var currentScroll = document.scrollingElement.scrollTop;
    var disqus_target = document.getElementById('disqus_thread');

    if (disqus_target && (currentScroll > disqus_target.getBoundingClientRect().top - 150)) {
      load_disqus('disqus_shortname');
    }
  }, false);

</script>
<noscript>Please enable JavaScript to view the
  <a href="https://disqus.com/?ref_noscript">comments powered by Disqus.</a>
</noscript>

`/Users/aousabdo/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-ASETPartnersCorp/laptop/AI/interstellar-podcast/_site/audio/trim_audio.py`:

```````py
from pydub import AudioSegment

# Load the audio file - replace 'audio.mp3' with your filename 
audio = AudioSegment.from_file("ai_science_podcast_episode_1_garageband_final.mp3", format="mp3")

# Define start and end times for the preview (in milliseconds)
start_time = 214 * 1000  # 214 seconds to milliseconds
end_time = 289 * 1000    # 289 seconds to milliseconds

# Trim the audio
preview = audio[start_time:end_time]

# Save the preview as a new audio file - choose your desired filename
preview.export("episode-1-preview.mp3", format="mp3")

print("Podcast preview created successfully!")
```````

`/Users/aousabdo/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-ASETPartnersCorp/laptop/AI/interstellar-podcast/_site/styleguide/index.html`:

      </li>
      
    
  
    
      
    
  
    
      
    
  
    
      
    
  
    
      
    
  
    
      
    
  
    
      
    
  
    
      
    
  
    
      
    
  
    
      
    
  
    
      
    
  
    
      
    
  
    
      
    
  
    
      
    
  
    
      
    
  
    
      
    
  
    
      
    
  
    
      
    
  
    
      
    
  
    
      
    
  
</ul>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </nav>
      </div>

<!-- begin page -->
<div class="container">
  <article class="page animate">
    <div class="page__content">
      <nav>
  <div class="language-plaintext highlighter-rouge"><div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight"><code>&lt;h4&gt;Table of Contents&lt;/h4&gt;
* this unordered seed list will be replaced by toc as unordered list
{:toc}
</code></pre></div>  </div>
</nav>

<ul id="markdown-toc">
  <li><a href="#headings-by-default" id="markdown-toc-headings-by-default">Headings by default:</a></li>
  <li><a href="#h1-for-example" id="markdown-toc-h1-for-example">H1 For example</a>    <ul>
      <li><a href="#h2-for-example" id="markdown-toc-h2-for-example">H2 For example</a>        <ul>
          <li><a href="#h3-for-example" id="markdown-toc-h3-for-example">H3 For example</a>            <ul>
              <li><a href="#h4-for-example" id="markdown-toc-h4-for-example">H4 For example</a>                <ul>
                  <li><a href="#h5-for-example" id="markdown-toc-h5-for-example">H5 For example</a>                    <ul>
                      <li><a href="#h6-for-example" id="markdown-toc-h6-for-example">H6 For example</a></li>
                    </ul>
                  </li>
                </ul>
              </li>
            </ul>
          </li>
        </ul>
      </li>
      <li><a href="#lists" id="markdown-toc-lists">Lists</a>        <ul>
          <li><a href="#ordered-list-example" id="markdown-toc-ordered-list-example">Ordered list example:</a></li>
          <li><a href="#unordered-list-example" id="markdown-toc-unordered-list-example">Unordered list example:</a></li>
          <li><a href="#table" id="markdown-toc-table">Table</a></li>
        </ul>
      </li>
      <li><a href="#quotes" id="markdown-toc-quotes">Quotes</a>        <ul>
          <li><a href="#a-quote-looks-like-this" id="markdown-toc-a-quote-looks-like-this">A quote looks like this:</a></li>
        </ul>
      </li>
      <li><a href="#syntax-highlighter" id="markdown-toc-syntax-highlighter">Syntax Highlighter</a></li>
      <li><a href="#images" id="markdown-toc-images">Images</a></li>
      <li><a href="#youtube-embed" id="markdown-toc-youtube-embed">Youtube Embed</a></li>
      <li><a href="#vimeo-embed" id="markdown-toc-vimeo-embed">Vimeo Embed</a></li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<p>A paragraph looks like this — dolor amet cray stumptown fingerstache neutra food truck seitan poke cardigan waistcoat VHS snackwave celiac hella. Godard seitan shoreditch flexitarian next level trust fund man braid vegan listicle keytar bitters. Disrupt cray fashion axe unicorn lomo shaman poke glossier keffiyeh snackwave austin tattooed seitan hexagon lo-fi. Lumbersexual irony vaporware, butcher shaman.</p>

<hr />

<h2 id="headings-by-default">Headings by default:</h2>

<h1 id="h1-for-example">H1 For example</h1>
<h2 id="h2-for-example">H2 For example</h2>
<h3 id="h3-for-example">H3 For example</h3>
<h4 id="h4-for-example">H4 For example</h4>
<h5 id="h5-for-example">H5 For example</h5>
<h6 id="h6-for-example">H6 For example</h6>

<figure class="highlight">
  <pre><code class="language-markdown" data-lang="markdown"><span class="gu">## Heading first level</span>
<span class="gu">### Heading second level</span>
<span class="gu">#### Heading third level</span></code></pre>
</figure>

<hr />

<h2 id="lists">Lists</h2>

<h4 id="ordered-list-example">Ordered list example:</h4>

<ol>
  <li>Poutine drinking vinegar bitters.</li>
  <li>Coloring book distillery fanny pack.</li>
  <li>Venmo biodiesel gentrify enamel pin meditation.</li>
  <li>Jean shorts shaman listicle pickled portland.</li>
  <li>Salvia mumblecore brunch iPhone migas.</li>
</ol>

<figure class="highlight">
  <pre><code class="language-markdown" data-lang="markdown"><span class="p">1.</span> Order list item 1
<span class="p">2.</span> Order list item 1</code></pre>
</figure>

<hr />

<h4 id="unordered-list-example">Unordered list example:</h4>

<ul>
  <li>Bitters semiotics vice thundercats synth.</li>
  <li>Literally cred narwhal bitters wayfarers.</li>
  <li>Kale chips chartreuse paleo tbh street art marfa.</li>
  <li>Mlkshk polaroid sriracha brooklyn.</li>
  <li>Pug you probably haven’t heard of them air plant man bun.</li>
</ul>

<figure class="highlight">
  <pre><code class="language-markdown" data-lang="markdown"><span class="p">*</span> Unordered list item 1
<span class="p">*</span> Unordered list item 2</code></pre>
</figure>

<hr />

<div class="table-container">
  <table>
    <tr><th>Header 1</th><th>Header 2</th><th>Header 3</th><th>Header 4</th><th>Header 5</th></tr>
    <tr><td>Row:1 Cell:1</td><td>Row:1 Cell:2</td><td>Row:1 Cell:3</td><td>Row:1 Cell:4</td><td>Row:1 Cell:5</td></tr>
    <tr><td>Row:2 Cell:1</td><td>Row:2 Cell:2</td><td>Row:2 Cell:3</td><td>Row:2 Cell:4</td><td>Row:2 Cell:5</td></tr>
    <tr><td>Row:3 Cell:1</td><td>Row:3 Cell:2</td><td>Row:3 Cell:3</td><td>Row:3 Cell:4</td><td>Row:3 Cell:5</td></tr>
    <tr><td>Row:4 Cell:1</td><td>Row:4 Cell:2</td><td>Row:4 Cell:3</td><td>Row:4 Cell:4</td><td>Row:4 Cell:5</td></tr>
    <tr><td>Row:5 Cell:1</td><td>Row:5 Cell:2</td><td>Row:5 Cell:3</td><td>Row:5 Cell:4</td><td>Row:5 Cell:5</td></tr>
    <tr><td>Row:6 Cell:1</td><td>Row:6 Cell:2</td><td>Row:6 Cell:3</td><td>Row:6 Cell:4</td><td>Row:6 Cell:5</td></tr>
  </table>
</div>

<hr />

<h2 id="quotes">Quotes</h2>

<h4 id="a-quote-looks-like-this">A quote looks like this:</h4>

<blockquote>
  <p>The longer I live, the more I realize that I am never wrong about anything, and that all the pains I have so humbly taken to verify my notions have only wasted my time!</p>

  <p><cite>George Bernard Shaw</cite></p>
</blockquote>

<figure class="highlight">
  <pre><code class="language-html" data-lang="html">&gt; The longer I live, the more I realize that I am never wrong about anything, and that all the pains I have so humbly taken to verify my notions have only wasted my time!
&gt;
&gt; <span class="nt">&lt;cite&gt;</span>George Bernard Shaw<span class="nt">&lt;/cite&gt;</span></code></pre>
</figure>

<hr />

<h2 id="syntax-highlighter">Syntax Highlighter</h2>

<figure class="highlight">
  <pre><code class="language-js" data-lang="js">  <span class="nf">$</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">.top</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nf">click</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nf">function </span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nf">$</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">html, body</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nf">stop</span><span class="p">().</span><span class="nf">animate</span><span class="p">({</span> <span class="na">scrollTop</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">0</span> <span class="p">},</span> <span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">slow</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">swing</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="p">});</span>
  <span class="nf">$</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">window</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nf">scroll</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nf">function </span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nf">$</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="k">this</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nf">scrollTop</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="nf">$</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">window</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nf">height</span><span class="p">())</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nf">$</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">.top</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nf">addClass</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">top-active</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nf">$</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">.top</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nf">removeClass</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">top-active</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="p">};</span>
  <span class="p">});</span></code></pre>
</figure>

768px){.cta-buttons{flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-between}.cta-button{width:auto}}.cta-button:hover{opacity:.9;transform:translateY(-2px);transition:all .3s ease}
  </style>
</head>

  <div class="article__inner">

    
    <a class="article__image" href="/ai-and-science-podcast/2024/07/18/Episode-4-AI-and-the-Search-for-Extraterrestrial-Life/">
      <img class="lazy" data-src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/AI-and-the-Search-for-Extraterrestrial-Life.jpeg" alt="Episode 4: AI and the Search for Extraterrestrial Life">
    </a>
    

    <div class="article__content">

      <div class="article__meta">
        <span class="article__minutes">
          
            coming soon
          
        </span>
          <time class="article__date" datetime="2024-07-18T10:00:00-04:00">Jul 18, 2024</time>
        </span>
      </div>

      <h2 class="article__title">Episode 4: AI and the Search for Extraterrestrial Life</h2>

      <p class="article__excerpt">Uncover the cosmic quest for alien life, powered by AI. From decoding interstellar signals to spotting habitable worlds, join us as we explore how artificial intelligence is transforming our search for extraterrestrial intelligence and reshaping our understanding of life in the universe.</p>

      <div class="article__bottom">

        
        <div class="article__author">
          <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" aria-label="Dr. Aous A. Abdo"><img class="article__author-image lazy" data-src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/author-profile-square.png" alt="Dr. Aous A. Abdo's Picture"></a>
        </div>
        

        <div class="article__bottom-meta">
          
            <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" class="article__author-link">Dr. Aous A. Abdo</a>
          
          
            <span>in</span>
            <span class="article-tags">
              
                <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/AI" class="article__tag">AI</a>
              
                <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/Space" class="article__tag">Space</a>
              
                <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/Life" class="article__tag">Life</a>
              
                <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/Apocalypse" class="article__tag">Apocalypse</a>
              
            </span>
          
        </div>
      </div>

    </div>

  </div>
</div>
          
            <div class="article col col-4 col-d-6 col-t-12 grid__post animate">
  <div class="article__inner">

    
    <a class="article__image" href="/ai-and-science-podcast/2024/07/17/Episode-3-Rise-of-the-Machines-Unveiling-the-Singularity/">
      <img class="lazy" data-src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/Rise-of-the-Machines-Unveiling-the-Singularity.jpeg" alt="Episode 3: Rise of the Machines: Unveiling the Singularity">
    </a>
    

    <div class="article__content">

      <div class="article__meta">
        <span class="article__minutes">
          
            coming soon
          
        </span>
          <time class="article__date" datetime="2024-07-17T10:00:00-04:00">Jul 17, 2024</time>
        </span>
      </div>

      <h2 class="article__title">Episode 3: Rise of the Machines: Unveiling the Singularity</h2>

      <p class="article__excerpt">Explore the future of Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) and Superintelligence (ASI) in "Rise of the Machines, Unveiling the Singularity". Discover the potential impacts, ethical considerations, and implications of machines surpassing human intelligence.</p>

      <div class="article__bottom">

        
        <div class="article__author">
          <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" aria-label="Dr. Aous A. Abdo"><img class="article__author-image lazy" data-src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/author-profile-square.png" alt="Dr. Aous A. Abdo's Picture"></a>
        </div>
        

        <div class="article__bottom-meta">
          
            <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" class="article__author-link">Dr. Aous A. Abdo</a>
          
          
            <span>in</span>
            <span class="article-tags">
              
                <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/AI" class="article__tag">AI</a>
              
                <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/Space" class="article__tag">Space</a>
              
                <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/Life" class="article__tag">Life</a>
              
                <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/Apocalypse" class="article__tag">Apocalypse</a>
              
            </span>

      <h2 class="article__title">Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value</h2>

      <p class="article__excerpt">Sin tantum modo ad indicia veteris memoriae cognoscenda, curiosorum. Haec et tu ita posuisti, et verba vestra sunt. Idemne potest esse dies...</p>

      <div class="article__bottom">

        
        <div class="article__author">

        </div>

      <h2 class="article__title">That which does not kill us makes us stronger</h2>

      <p class="article__excerpt">Sin tantum modo ad indicia veteris memoriae cognoscenda, curiosorum. Haec et tu ita posuisti, et verba vestra sunt. Idemne potest esse dies...</p>

`/Users/aousabdo/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-ASETPartnersCorp/laptop/AI/interstellar-podcast/_site/tag/lifestyle/index.html`:

```````html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
  <meta charset="utf-8">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">

  <title>The AI And Science Podcast</title>
  <meta name='description' content='Explore the fascinating world of AI and its impact on science with Dr. Aous Abdo.'>

  <link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:4000/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/lifestyle/">
  <link rel="alternate" type="application/rss+xml" title="The AI And Science Podcast" href="/ai-and-science-podcast/feed.xml">

  <!-- Fonts -->
  <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;700;900&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

  <!-- Ionicons -->
  <link href="https://unpkg.com/ionicons@4.2.2/dist/css/ionicons.min.css" rel="stylesheet">

  <style>
  
  /*!------------------------------------------------------------------
[MAIN STYLESHEET]

.prev:hover::after,.post__navigation .next:hover::after{background-color:rgba(9,8,15,.7)}.post__navigation .prev .post__nav,.post__navigation .next .next{text-align:right;margin-left:auto}@media only screen and (max-width: 768px){.post__navigation{flex-wrap:wrap;box-shadow:none}.post__navigation .prev,.post__navigation .next{width:100%;border-radius:16px;box-shadow:0 5px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.5)}.post__navigation .prev img,.post__navigation .next img{border-radius:16px}.post__navigation .prev{margin-bottom:20px}}@media only screen and (max-width: 576px){.post__navigation{margin-bottom:48px}}.related-posts{display:none}.related-posts.is-related{display:block}.related-posts 576px){.post-comments{padding:48px 32px}}.full-episode-link{display:inline-block;margin-top:20px;margin-bottom:20px;padding:15px ease}.full-episode-link:hover{background-color:#08c}.cta-section{background-color:#f0f0f0;padding:20px;border-radius:8px;text-align:center;margin:20px 0}.cta-section     <div class="article__content">

      <div class="article__meta">
        <span class="article__minutes">
          
            coming soon
          
        </span>
          <time class="article__date" datetime="2024-07-18T10:00:00-04:00">Jul 18, 2024</time>
        </span>
      </div>

      <h2 class="article__title">Episode 4: AI and the Search for Extraterrestrial Life</h2>

      <p class="article__excerpt">Uncover the cosmic quest for alien life, powered by AI. From decoding interstellar signals to spotting habitable worlds, join us as we explore how artificial intelligence is transforming our search for extraterrestrial intelligence and reshaping our understanding of life in the universe.</p>

      <div class="article__bottom">

        
        <div class="article__author">
          <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" aria-label="Dr. Aous A. Abdo"><img class="article__author-image lazy" data-src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/author-profile-square.png" alt="Dr. Aous A. Abdo's Picture"></a>
        </div>
        

        <div class="article__bottom-meta">
          
            <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" class="article__author-link">Dr. Aous A. Abdo</a>
          
          
            <span>in</span>

                <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/Life" class="article__tag">Life</a>
              
                <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/Apocalypse" class="article__tag">Apocalypse</a>
              
            </span>
          
        </div>
      </div>

    <a class="article__image" href="/ai-and-science-podcast/2024/07/17/Episode-3-Rise-of-the-Machines-Unveiling-the-Singularity/">
      <img class="lazy" data-src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/Rise-of-the-Machines-Unveiling-the-Singularity.jpeg" alt="Episode 3: Rise of the Machines: Unveiling the Singularity">
    </a>
    

    <div class="article__content">

      <div class="article__meta">
        <span class="article__minutes">
          
            coming soon
          
        </span>
          <time class="article__date" datetime="2024-07-17T10:00:00-04:00">Jul 17, 2024</time>
        </span>
      </div>

      <h2 class="article__title">Episode 3: Rise of the Machines: Unveiling the Singularity</h2>

      <p class="article__excerpt">Explore the future of Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) and Superintelligence (ASI) in "Rise of the Machines, Unveiling the Singularity". Discover the potential impacts, ethical considerations, and implications of machines surpassing human intelligence.</p>

      <div class="article__bottom">

        
        <div class="article__author">
          <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" aria-label="Dr. Aous A. Abdo"><img class="article__author-image lazy" data-src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/author-profile-square.png" alt="Dr. Aous A. Abdo's Picture"></a>
        </div>
        

        <div class="article__bottom-meta">
          
            <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" class="article__author-link">Dr. Aous A. Abdo</a>
          
          
            <span>in</span>
            <span class="article-tags">

                <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/Space" class="article__tag">Space</a>
              
                <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/Life" class="article__tag">Life</a>
              
                <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/Apocalypse" class="article__tag">Apocalypse</a>

      <img class="lazy" data-src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/Goldilocks_Zone.jpeg" alt="Episode 2: Cosmic Sweet Spot: Exploring the Goldilocks Zone">
    </a>
    

    <div class="article__content">

      <div class="article__meta">
        <span class="article__minutes">
          
            coming soon
          
        </span>
          <time class="article__date" datetime="2024-07-15T10:00:00-04:00">Jul 15, 2024</time>
        </span>
      </div>

      <h2 class="article__title">Episode 2: Cosmic Sweet Spot: Exploring the Goldilocks Zone</h2>

      <p class="article__excerpt">Join me on this exciting episode of "Cosmic Sweet Spot Exploring the Goldilocks Zone" as we delve into the fascinating world of the habitable zone around stars, where conditions are just right for life as we know it. Discover why Earth is perfectly positioned and explore the potential for life on other planets within this cosmic sweet spot</p>

      <div class="article__bottom">

        
        <div class="article__author">
          <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" aria-label="Dr. Aous A. Abdo"><img class="article__author-image lazy" data-src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/author-profile-square.png" alt="Dr. Aous A. Abdo's Picture"></a>
        </div>

```````html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
  <meta charset="utf-8">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">

  <title>The AI And Science Podcast</title>
  <meta name='description' content='Explore the fascinating world of AI and its impact on science with Dr. Aous Abdo.'>

  <link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:4000/ai-and-science-podcast/tag/ai/">
  <link rel="alternate" type="application/rss+xml" title="The AI And Science Podcast" href="/ai-and-science-podcast/feed.xml">

  <!-- Fonts -->
  <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;700;900&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

  <!-- Ionicons -->
  <link href="https://unpkg.com/ionicons@4.2.2/dist/css/ionicons.min.css" rel="stylesheet">

  <style>
  
  /*!------------------------------------------------------------------
[MAIN STYLESHEET]
-------------------------------------------------------------------*/.block{display:block}.inline-block{display:inline-block}.inline{display:inline}.show{display:block}.hide{display:none}.invisible{visibility:hidden}.list-reset{list-style-type:none;margin:0;padding:0}.clearfix::after,.clearfix ::before{content:"";display:table;clear:both}.screen-reader-text{clip:rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);height:1px;overflow:hidden;position:absolute !important;width:1px;word-wrap:normal !important}/*!       <h2 class="article__title">Episode 4: AI and the Search for Extraterrestrial Life</h2>

      <p class="article__excerpt">Uncover the cosmic quest for alien life, powered by AI. From decoding interstellar signals to spotting habitable worlds, join us as we explore how artificial intelligence is transforming our search for extraterrestrial intelligence and reshaping our understanding of life in the universe.</p>

      <div class="article__bottom">

        
        <div class="article__author">
          <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" aria-label="Dr. Aous A. Abdo"><img class="article__author-image lazy" data-src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/author-profile-square.png" alt="Dr. Aous A. Abdo's Picture"></a>
        </div>

      <h2 class="article__title">Episode 3: Rise of the Machines: Unveiling the Singularity</h2>

      <p class="article__excerpt">Explore the future of Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) and Superintelligence (ASI) in "Rise of the Machines, Unveiling the Singularity". Discover the potential impacts, ethical considerations, and implications of machines surpassing human intelligence.</p>

      <div class="article__bottom">

        
        <div class="article__author">
          <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" aria-label="Dr. Aous A. Abdo"><img class="article__author-image lazy" data-src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/author-profile-square.png" alt="Dr. Aous A. Abdo's Picture"></a>
        </div>

      <h2 class="article__title">Episode 2: Cosmic Sweet Spot: Exploring the Goldilocks Zone</h2>

      <p class="article__excerpt">Join me on this exciting episode of "Cosmic Sweet Spot Exploring the Goldilocks Zone" as we delve into the fascinating world of the habitable zone around stars, where conditions are just right for life as we know it. Discover why Earth is perfectly positioned and explore the potential for life on other planets within this cosmic sweet spot</p>

      <div class="article__bottom">

        
        <div class="article__author">
          <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" aria-label="Dr. Aous A. Abdo"><img class="article__author-image lazy" data-src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/author-profile-square.png" alt="Dr. Aous A. Abdo's Picture"></a>
        </div>

      <div class="article__meta">

      <h2 class="article__title">Episode 1: AI Space Odyssey: Exploring the Cosmos with Artificial Intelligence</h2>

      <p class="article__excerpt">Journey through the cosmos as we explore how artificial intelligence is revolutionizing space exploration. From discovering hidden planets to designing futuristic spacecraft, AI is pushing the boundaries of what's possible in our understanding of the universe.</p>

      <div class="article__bottom">

        
        <div class="article__author">
          <a href="/ai-and-science-podcast/about/" aria-label="Dr. Aous A. Abdo"><img class="article__author-image lazy" data-src="/ai-and-science-podcast/images/author-profile-square.png" alt="Dr. Aous A. Abdo's Picture"></a>

<script src="/ai-and-science-podcast/js/common.js"></script>
<script>
  var base_url = "",
    pagination_next_url = base_url + '/page2',
    pagination_next_page_number = '',
    pagination_available_pages_number = '';
</script>
</body>

</html>
```````
